definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Eggs that are scrambled and eaten with toast are typically unfertilized.
sentences.chinese: 我们吃的炒鸡蛋一般来说是未受精的鸡蛋。

sentences.english: Delaying pregnancy can decrease the likelihood that you'll be able to conceive.
sentences.chinese: 年龄过大会导致受精能力下降。

sentences.english: Artificial insemination was a significant breakthrough in panda conservation.
sentences.chinese: 人工受精是熊猫保护领域的重大突破。

sentences.english: Blastula and gastrulae arrived 1 and 4 d after fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 在卵受精后第1天和第4天分别到达囊胚期和原肠期。

sentences.english: Pollen is usually blown to other trees and fertilizes their ovules.
sentences.chinese: 花粉通常会被风吹到其它树上使其受精。

sentences.english: Only one sperm fertilizes an egg.
sentences.chinese: 只有一个精子使卵子受精。

sentences.english: Most megadrile earth worms reproduce by normal cross-fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 大多数巨蚓的生殖是正常异体受精。

sentences.english: Seed development in most instances commences following fertilization of the ovule.
sentences.chinese: 大多数种子的形成是从胚珠受精开始的。

sentences.english: This made no sense. All the eggs are fertilized already.
sentences.chinese: 这可说不通，因为所有的卵都已经受精了。

sentences.english: After the egg fertilized, it Underwent cortical reaction and formed fertilization membrane.
sentences.chinese: 卵子受精后，发生皮层反应形成受精膜。

sentences.english: After the egg fertilized, it Underwent cortical reaction and formed fertilization membrane.
sentences.chinese: 卵子受精后，发生皮层反应形成受精膜。

sentences.english: The micropyle of the matured oocyte in the phase 5 was blocked up by the micropyle cells.
sentences.chinese: 在第5时相成熟卵子的受精孔中仍有精孔细胞堵塞。

sentences.english: The fertilization of Tamarix chinensis was observed by means of conventional paraffin sectioning.
sentences.chinese: 利用常规石蜡制片技术，观察了柽柳的受精作用。

sentences.english: And that's where the egg – there's usually only one in the woman's pond at a time – gets fertilised.
sentences.chinese: 每一次女人的池塘里通常只有一个卵子可以受精”。

sentences.english: He formulated early a vision to develop an in vitro fertilization method to treat infertility.
sentences.chinese: 他很早就提出了用体外受精来解决不孕症的办法。

sentences.english: Double fertilization is the type of the Premitotic syngamy .
sentences.chinese: 双受精过程属有丝分裂前配子融合类型。

definition: cleavage of fertilized ovum into cells
corpus luteum (glands in female mammals producing progesterone)
